p: It appears that the selenium deficiency of the host promotes rapid genomic evolution of the virus in HA and NA genes as compared with selenium adequate animals [ 53, 95, 122, 123, 124, 125]. Strikingly, these mutations are not stochastic as they were identical in three independent mice fed in selenium deficient diet. In comparison, very few mutations were detected in animals fed with adequate selenium diet. These data further confirm the impact of selenium status of the host in viral genome evolution.
